content: Flat Washer Electrogalvanized washer (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile â€“ flat washers can help to prevent bolts loosening due to vibration or pulling through the base material, and can also be used as spacers Available in various sizes Helps to distribute loads better Applications Fixing and fastening Recommended for structural and mechanical assemblies Recommended for indoor environments Used as space fillers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel - AISI 1005 through 1035 Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel - AISI 1005 through 1035 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 411761 - Fender Washer zinc 1/4 x 1-1/4 - Package Size 100 pc - 411756 - Washer zinc 1/4 - Package Size 200 pc - 411757 - Washer zinc 3/8 - Package Size 200 pc - 411763 - Fender Washer zinc 1/2 x 2 - Package Size 100 pc - 411758 - Washer zinc 1/2 - Package Size 100 pc - 411759 - Washer zinc 5/8 - Package Size 100 pc - 411760 - Washer zinc 3/4 - Package Size 50 pc
